SEARCH
Package com.kneelawk.graphlib.api.world

Class UnloadingRegionBasedStorage<R>

java.lang.Object
com.kneelawk.graphlib.api.world.UnloadingRegionBasedStorage<R>
Type Parameters:
R - the type of chunk data to store.
All Implemented Interfaces:
RegionBasedStorage<R>, AutoCloseable
public class UnloadingRegionBasedStorage<R> extends Object implements RegionBasedStorage<R>
A region-based storage that unloads chunks after a set time.

  • Field Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • UnloadingRegionBasedStorage

      public UnloadingRegionBasedStorage(@NotNull @NotNull net.minecraft.world.level.chunk.storage.RegionStorageInfo storageKey, @NotNull @NotNull net.minecraft.server.level.ServerLevel world, @NotNull @NotNull Path path, boolean syncChunkWrites, @NotNull @NotNull com.mojang.serialization.Codec<R> codec, @NotNull @NotNull TrackingChunkFactory<@NotNull R> createNew, @NotNull @NotNull SaveMode saveMode)
      Constructs an unloading region-based-storage.
      Parameters:
      storageKey - the key used to describe this storage element when profiling.
      world - the server world this storage is associated with.
      path - the path to where region files should be saved.
      syncChunkWrites - whether chunk writes should be written synchronously, corresponding to StandardOpenOption.DSYNC.
      codec - the chunk section's codec.
      createNew - the function for creating a new, empty chunk section.
      saveMode - how often storage chunks should be saved.
